trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event.
The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.

It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the BackColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item that is being drawn.
Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor and with the appropriate color.
If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the ForeColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the ForeColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item being drawn.
Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface to draw the item on.
Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.

This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.
This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
The numeric value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*> value of the item being drawn.
Gets the state of the item being drawn.
This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
